article: barack obama on sunday savored an easy victory over hillary rodham clinton in wyoming 's caucuses , capturing new momentum after recent setbacks in their fierce tug-of-war for the democratic presidential nomination that could drag on for months .
abstract: obama defeats clinton in wyoming caucuses the latest prize in epic democratic race
